body: Great, that's exactly what I needed. Do you know where your CUDA libraries are? It seems that you don't have it in the default paths. Build system finds `CUDA_HOME` to be `/is/software/nvidia/cuda-8.0/`, so it assumes CUDA runtime libs are in `/is/software/nvidia/cuda-8.0/lib64`.
